data.title: Contact Investor Relations ORANGES!!!
data.maintext:
Contact details

Retail shareholders should use the contact details listed on the Shareholder enquiries page. 

Enquiries from institutional shareholders may be directed to:

International
Investor Relations
Royal Dutch Shell plc
PO Box 162
2501 AN The Hague
The Netherlands
Tel +31 (0)70 377 4540
ir-europe@shell.com

 

 United States
Investor Relations
Shell Oil Company
910 Louisiana Street, 4580B
Houston, TX 77002
USA
Tel +1 713 241 1042
Fax +1 713 241 0176
ir-usa@shell.com

Please note that calls to Shell Investor Relations may be recorded.
Scroll down for details .

Investor Relations team

Europe

Peter van Driel
Vice President Investor Relations, Europe

Peter van Driel is responsible for all contacts and relationship management with current and potential institutional shareholders of Royal Dutch Shell plc. in Europe. He joined Shell in 1991 and has held various finance positions in Downstream, Trading and Upstream, such as Distribution Finance Manager for Europe, Business Finance Manager Russia, and Head of Corporate M&A and Commercial Finance for the Americas and later for Upstream International. Before taking up his current role in March 2013, Peter was based in the United Kingdom, the Philippines, Russia and the USA.
Languages: English, Dutch, German

 

 

   

Alger Steenhuis
Senior Investor Relations Officer
(Asia-Pacific Markets)

Alger Steenhuis is the primary contact for institutional shareholders and analysts in Asia Pacific. He held a variety of roles in the investment industry for a decade prior to joining Shell in 2006. Alger is a CFA charter holder.
Languages: Dutch, English, German


Caroline Hes
Senior Investor Relations Officer

Caroline Hes joined Shell in 1992 after finishing her business economics degree (MSc) and since has worked in a range of global, regional and local finance roles in Downstream (Chemicals and Retail); Internal Audit and worked for 4 years in one of Shell’s JVs in Nigeria. She joined Investor Relations in June 2011.
Languages: Dutch, English


Kyle Jarton
Investor Relations Financial Officer
(Socially Responsible Investors)

Kyle Jarton is accountable for the Socially Responsible Investors program and is based in the Hague. Kyle has a degree in Mechanical Engineering, MBA and is a CFA charter holder. Prior to joining the IR team, Kyle has worked in various technical, finance and commercial roles in the oil and gas industry and joined Shell in 2005.
Languages: English


Cerys Reece
Investor Relations Officer
(Socially Responsible Investors)

Cerys Reece works on our Socially Responsible Investors program and is based in The Hague. Cerys has a degree in Law with French and is a CA Chartered Accountant. Since joining Shell in 2011, Cerys has worked as a financial controller in the Holdings and Treasury team. Prior to joining Shell, Cerys was an Audit Manager with experience in the industrial products and technology sectors.
Languages: English, French


Luc Steuns
Investor Relations Financial Analyst

Luc Steuns holds a Masters degree in Financial Economics from the Erasmus University in Rotterdam and joined Shell in 2008. He has worked in the Chemicals business and in Asset Management prior to joining the team.
Languages: Dutch, English, Spanish

 

 


Siti Hadiana Ahmad
Investor Relations Financial Analyst

Siti Hadiana Ahmad is an ACCA chartered accountant and accountancy bachelor holder with experience in insurance and financial sectors in Dublin prior to joining Shell in 2005. She held a number of business finance advisory roles in Downstream and IT as well as Corporate finance controller in Shell Malaysia and joined Investor Relations team in The Hague in February 2012.
Languages: English, Malay


Roomsha Bansie
Investor Relations Events Organiser

Roomsha Bansie has worked for Shell since 1996. She is responsible for organizing shareholder engagements with Royal Dutch Shell management.
Languages: Dutch, English, French, German



Claudia Van Bemmelen
Investor Relations Assistant

Claudia Van Bemmelen joined Shell in 1985 and is the personal assistant to JJ Traynor and Peter van Driel.
Languages: Dutch, English, German

 

 

 

North America

Ken Lawrence
Vice President Investor Relations, North America

Ken Lawrence joined shell in 1982 as a Petroleum Engineer. He has had 20+ years of Upstream experience and has been working in Investor Relations since 2006.
   


Jean Young
Retail Investor Relations Manager, US

Jean Young manages Shell’s retail Investor Relations program in the United States after many years in IR at other public companies and IR agencies. Jean holds an undergraduate degree in English and Communications from the State University of New York at Albany and received an MBA in Finance from Fordham University Graduate School of Business.


Ryan Birse
Senior Investor Relations Officer, US

Ryan Birse joined Shell in 1997 and is a Certified Management Accountant. He has held various finance roles in Shell including corporate head office and site operations roles in on-shore gas and heavy oil. Ryan joined Investor Relations based in Houston in 2012.


Susanna Morley
Personal Assistant for VP Investor Relations, North America

Susanna is the personal assistant to Ken Lawrence.

  

 

 

JJ Traynor
Executive Vice President Investor Relations

JJ Traynor heads up Shell’s Investor Relations team, and is based in The Hague. JJ has a PhD in geology, and has worked extensively in oil & gas exploration projects earlier in his career. Prior to joining Shell in 2005 he was Managing Director of Global Oil & Gas Research at Deutsche Bank.

Other contact information


REGISTERED OFFICE
Royal Dutch Shell plc
Shell Centre
London SE1 7NA
United Kingdom

Registered in England and Wales
Company number 4366849
Registered with the Dutch Trade Register under number 34179503


HEADQUARTERS
Royal Dutch Shell plc
Carel van Bylandtlaan 30
2596 HR The Hague
The Netherlands


SHARE REGISTRAR
Equiniti
Aspect House
Spencer Road
Lancing
West Sussex BN99 6DA
United Kingdom
Freephone 0800 169 1679 (UK only)
Tel +44 (0)121 415 7073
Fax +44 (0)190 383 3168

for online information about your holding. Shareholder reference number will be required – shown on your share certificates, tax vouchers or your Shell Nominee Statement.


AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES (ADSs)
The Bank of New York Mellon
PO Box 358516
Pittsburgh, PA 15252–8516
USA
Tel +1 888 737 2377 (North America only)
Tel +1 201 680 6825 (international)
E-mail shrrelations@bnymellon.com
 

Please note that calls to Shell Investor Relations may be recorded.

The purpose of the recordings is to ensure Shell can demonstrate compliance with legal and regulatory requirements regarding disclosure of information about Shell during the calls.

The calls may contain personal data such as your voice, name and job title and will be processed in line with Shell’s Data Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy for Investor Relations Call Recording provides you with additional information about Call Recording only.

The personal data processed by Investor Relations Call Recording will be controlled by Shell International B.V. In order to process the personal data provided and otherwise for the purposes indicated, your personal data may be disclosed to other Shell companies and to third party organizations providing administration or other services.

Shell International B.V. will ensure that your personal data is protected in accordance with the applicable Data Protection legislation. This will also be the case when data is transferred to countries outside of the European Economic Area providing a different level of (legal) protection from that offered in the European Economic Area or do not have laws to protect personal data.

If you have any questions about the call recording or wish access to your personal data, please contact the Shell webmaster.

data.title: Contact Media Relations
data.summary: Media Relations deals with all media enquiries relating to the Group's corporate activities and its international businesses.
data.maintext:
The Media Relations team can only answer queries from members of the media.

For other questions, including customer queries, please use the contact details as listed on the Contact Us page.

For image and video downloads, please visit the Image Library.

Media Relations contacts

Andy Norman is Vice President, Global Media Relations, based in the UK.

Publications

Printed copies of our 2010 annual publications can be requested, free of charge via this annual publications order form. With further ordering questions email us at order@shell.com or call +31 (0) 888 800 844.

If you are from the US, printed copies of the 2010 Annual Review and the 2010 Annual Report and Form 20-F can be requested, free of charge, via this US annual publications order form or call +1 888 400 7789.
